name: Bullet Life [2010-2011]
description:
Bullet Life was released in 2010 on my high school senior year for the Scholastic Art and Writing contest. The video game category was judged by Tony Hawk, and I was awarded a National Gold Medal at Carnegie Hall.

The game itself was designed (as far as I can tell) the very fist intentional 3D Bullet Hell game, mixing together elements from Bullet Hell and Starfox 64.

Play this game's arcade like single player mode, or get a friend and and a 1v1 dog fight!
